q: House, many signs point to him running for Indiana governor in 2012 instead. No one else mulling a presidential run faces a similar quandary. Mr. Bauer Mike Pence says he plans to announce his decision early next year. I'd put money on him running for governor over president, because the field is a lot smaller and he wouldn't be running against an incumbent, says Indiana's recently retired GOP chairman, Murray Clark . Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass.
